name: GetZoomWebinarReport
description:
Retrieve details of a past Zoom webinar.

Use this tool to get a report containing the details of a past Zoom webinar. It requires a Pro or higher plan with the Webinar add-on and specific scopes like `report:read:admin`. Useful for accessing comprehensive webinar data.

parameters.name: webinar_identifier
parameters.description: The ID or UUID of the webinar. Use webinar ID for latest instance or UUID, which may need double encoding if it starts with '/' or contains '//'.

value_schema.description:
The webinar's ID or universally unique ID (UUID). 
* If you provide a webinar ID, the API will return a response for the latest webinar instance. 
* If you provide a webinar UUID that begins with a `/` character or contains the `//` characters, you **must** [double encode](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/using-zoom-apis/#meeting-id-and-uuid) the webinar UUID before making an API request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.
